name: HSP_ACCT_RFV_LIST
description: This table contains hospital account reason for visit diagnosis information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the reason for visit diagnosis.  Multiple reason for visit diagnoses can occur on one hospital account, so each diagnosis has a unique line number.

columns.name: RFV_DX_ID
columns.description: The ID number of a reason for visit diagnosis stored in the hospital account.
